subject: JUNIT & HTML
msgSnippet: Is there a way I can invoke my testing (ADTTest): java junit.swingui.TestRunner junit.samples.ADTTest from an HTML object or applet tag (somthing like this):
messageBody:
Is there a way I can invoke my testing (ADTTest):

java junit.swingui.TestRunner junit.samples.ADTTest

from an HTML object or applet tag (somthing like this):

<OBJECT classid="clsid:8AD9C840-044E-11D1-B3E9-00805F499D93"
height="300" width="400"
codebase="http://java.sun.com/products/plugin/1.3/jinstall-13-
win32.cab#Version=1,2,0,0">';
<PARAM NAME="code" VALUE="junit.swingui.TestRunner">
<PARAM NAME="codebase" VALUE="../../junit3.8.1">
<PARAM NAME="archive" VALUE="junit.jar">
<PARAM NAME="test" VALUE="junit.samples.ADTTest">
</OBJECT>

Thanks in advance...Richard
